forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. West southwest wind around 14 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 50. West northwest wind 9 to 15 mph.

weather_report:
A crisp afternoon in Downtown San Francisco unfolds under a mostly sunny sky, though the day carries hints of its character from the lingering chill of the west southwest wind. As the temperature flirts with a high near sixty, a retreating marine layer may cloak some nearby hills, hinting at the whimsical dance of light and shadow that frequently graces this vibrant city. The air feels refreshing, with a soft breeze that carries the scent of the bay, perfect for those meandering along the Embarcadero or perhaps sipping coffee at a local café, watching the maritime parade of boats gracefully navigating the waters.

As night falls, expect a gentle transition into partly cloudy skies, with the temperature easing into the comforting embrace of fifty degrees. The west northwest wind remains a steady companion, inviting you to don a light jacket or sweater, perfect for an evening stroll through the vibrant streets. With the tranquil evening ahead, consider exploring the emerging culinary scene at one of the neighborhood eateries or simply enjoying a contemplative moment in a nearby park as the city lights twinkle like stars on the ground. This evening beckons, whispering promises of comfort and warmth, wrapped in the unique charm that only San Francisco can offer.
